concept.title: Care and Maintenance of Engine Valves
concept.shortdesc: Proper valve maintenance is critical for ensuring engine performance, power, and longevity.

section.title: Common Valve Issue: Carbon Deposits
section.p: Valves are prone to accumulating carbon deposits over time, which can significantly impact engine performance:

ul.li: Carbon builds up on valve seats
Deposits prevent valves from closing properly
Improper valve closure allows compressed gases to escape

section.title: Performance Implications
section.p: Carbon-related valve issues can lead to:

section.title: Diagnosing Valve Problems
section.p: Indicators that valves may need attention:

ul.li: Lack of resistance when slowly turning the engine
Noticeable performance drop in one or more cylinders
Reduced compression in specific engine cylinders

section.title: Valve Maintenance Recommendations

ol.li: Periodically re-grind valves to ensure proper seating
Clean carbon deposits from valve seats
Inspect valves during routine engine maintenance

section.note: The "life" of the engine significantly depends on proper valve maintenance and seating.
